sentence.text: Here, we utilized the CRISPR-Cas9 system to gentranscription by RNA polymerase IIte potassium ion import across plasma membrane mutant apoptotic process by zygote injection to verify the pathogenic role of human potassium ion import across plasma membrane, mutations of which are thought to cause Leber congenital amaurosis (clathrin coat assembly), an early-onset form of blindness.
